fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Share your defense with someone, giving them Basic defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The town's lynch is replaced by a Basic attack.
- Abilities that give defense will linger for the next day.
- You leave the town when you are done with your goal, removing yourself from the game, you also take one of the people who were lynched but survived with you, random if you pick any.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have town fail 3 lynches due to defense, or 2 if you are one of the lynched players.
